description: Steve is someone that already paired up with Bryce for a hot oral scene three weeks ago, directed by our pal Mike. I was so jazzed to get Steve's action scene up, I purposely waited to post his solo debut. So tonight, meet Steve -- properly!The rough-and-tumble guy is 24-years old, stands 5'10' tall and weighs in at 160 lbs. He's from Michigan and has been in the service for four years now.  Mike asks him how big his dick is, and Steve says it's '8' . . . close' to that. Even though Mike doesn't have a ruler on hand to measure Steve, I certainly believe his claim: This man is packing serious heat.About mid-way through his solo, Mike asks Steve, 'You ever had a guy suck your cock?' Steve looks at Mike with a look that can only be described as a 'what the fuck do you have up your sleeve'-look, and says 'No.' Mike: 'You think you could have someone do that?' Steve: 'No.' Mike: 'Has other guys tried to?' Steve: 'Plenty of guys . . . plenty.' Mike: 'You ever thought out it?' Steve: 'Sometimes I wonder what it would be like.' BINGO!Now, knowing what we know -- that Steve went on to shoot a sexy scene with Bryce where they both sucked one another -- it makes it all the more interesting to watch Steve's reactions to Mike's questions. If you haven't seen his scene with Bryce, do check it out. In the meantime, say hi to Steve!
title: Steve
